about_the_game:
Trucker 2056, a narrative trading RPG featuring a point-and-click driven plot and card-based combat. Heavily inspired by late 80s and early 90s classics by Sid Meier and MicroProse.

Set in a dystopian future Finland, you assume the role of a trucker on a desperate journey to find medicine for their dying daughter. What begins as simple errands for a local crime syndicate soon pulls you into a larger conflict between the oppressive Institute and resistance factions fighting to overthrow the authoritarian regime. Ultimately, the game explores profound themes of community, home, environmental collapse, technology, and fascism.

The core gameplay loop revolves around gathering resources through missions, transporting goods between cities, and engaging enemies in card-based combat. Resources can then be used to purchase and upgrade equipment for your truck. Each piece of equipment unlocks a unique set of combat cards, determined by your character's abilities.

Game Features:

  • 30 unique locations to explore in a point-and-click interface, spread across 10 cities

  • 6 factions to interact with and influence

  • 30 NPCs featuring dynamic dialogue trees, with 10 NPCs recruitable to your party

  • 50 missions, including 20 main missions and 30 side quests

  • 40 truck items to buy that unlock up to 120 combat cards

  • 15 enemy types, each with distinct AI and a pool of combat cards

  • 12 trade goods driving a fully implemented in-game economy

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes depictions of violence, presented through text and low-resolution yet realistic pixel graphics. Most of the interactive violence takes the form of Mad Max-style vehicular combat, also depicted in pixel graphics.

The game explores themes of community and oppression, including the oppression of sexual minorities. It contains references to sex, drugs, and alcohol, primarily conveyed through text. While the game features suggestive visuals, it does not include explicit depictions of sexual acts.

The game's language includes occasional swearing and crude expressions. It also explores themes of criminality, allowing the player to engage in actions considered crimes within the game's world. However, the game places a strong emphasis on the ethical implications of the player's choices.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
